data.text: @mister_e_s That was one of my main problems with the movie.  A guy who looked like they made Butler look would have had no problem existing in society.

@FaithKMoore Absolutely! I like his voice better, I really like seeing it all on a real stage, and the movie needlessly changes too many things. Also, he's way more grotesque than in the movie, where they seemed afraid to disfigure Butler too much.
